main event: A bright white oval-shaped light was observed moving at high speed and descending in Miami Beach, Florida on June 8, 1954.
interesting points: The light gradually faded away in the same position where it was observed.
The light was visible for approximately 7 minutes.
The witness, a Major in the USAAF, had never seen anything comparable to this observation before.
A second witness, James V. Wilkins, also provided a statement about observing a similar unidentified light in the sky on June 22, 1954.
The report indicates that Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's official study of UFOs, was involved in investigating these sightings.
